Package core

Class Construction

java.lang.Object
core.Construction
public class Construction
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the blueprint of each construction. It has defined task and GUI elements in it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Construction​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks, ConstructionManager cManager, Architect theObserver, SceneManager manager, java.lang.String name)
    Constructor for setting up the construction with the required data and assigning it to a construction manager.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearConstruction()
    Method for deleting every remaining progressbar and label from the displaying scenes.
    void confirmReadyFromCustomer()
    Method called from customer, to acknowledge that the construction has been created and it can be started.

    CustomLabel getConstName()

    SceneManager getManager()

  • Constructor Details

    • Construction

      public Construction​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks, ConstructionManager cManager, Architect theObserver, SceneManager manager, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor for setting up the construction with the required data and assigning it to a construction manager. Also create and display a progressbar indicating the overall progress.
      Parameters:
      tasks - The ArrayList of Tasks to do
      cManager - The construction manager who will control the flow of the job handling
      theObserver - The architect, who created this construction
      manager - The sceneManager for permission to draw on the pane
      name - The name of the construction from user input

  • Method Details

    • getcManager

      public ConstructionManager getcManager()

    • updateProgress

      public void updateProgress​(int tasksRemaining)
      Callback method from construction manager to update the overall progressbar. After setting the new value, update the scene.
      Parameters:
      tasksRemaining - Callback value from construction manager

    • clearConstruction

      public void clearConstruction()
      Method for deleting every remaining progressbar and label from the displaying scenes.

      public Customer getCustomer()
